line.comment: * ZH 2.0 - no more maintenance after player joins OCV
* Zero Hour 1.10
* Mordan8 delete
* do if $ship.makerRace == [OCV]
* return 0
* Research milestones effects.
* The Dry dock perk lowers maintenance of Caps by 75%, and smaller ships by 25%.
* ZH 2.0 - small ships still 25% cheaper
* return 0
* Zero Hour: ships docked to other ships cost nothing
* Mordan8 - Increase maintenance by 35% if the ship is of a design other than what your race normally produces. Specific race maintenance modifiers removed except for Yaki infamy modifier.
* Herobetty 4.5: $ship.race will return the ship's current owner. Must check the player's origin race instead.
* Add-Ons 1.4: No longer applies to private corp ships (they're neutral and utility-based), Phanon ships after the main plot is completed, or (1.5.2) Yaki ships if the player has infamy.
* Change Phanon exemption to foreign exemption.
* ZH 2.0 introduced diminishing returns.
* Add-Ons 1.4.9: Changed maintenance factors to reflect ship material costs.
* By default, the material costs are 100%, 109%, 118%, 127%, 136%, 145%, and 154% from garbage to impeccable. See Mayhem.Costs.Ship.
* This means garbage is 79%, mediocre is 86%, flawed is 93%, normal is 100%, good is 107%, exceptional is 114%, and impeccable is 121% of normal.
* Old maintenance factors are 58, 82, 94, 100, 106, 110, 111 (why SO LOW for impeccable)? Changed to garbage, mediocre, and impeccable to 66, 83, and 112.
* Event: Kernel Bug.
* advanced engineering perk where this was built.
* "Advanced" ships are more expensive to maintain; as it should be.
* Mordan2. - 35% more ship maintenance costs
* Add-Ons 1.3: Insane mode increases maintenance by 50%.

sval.val: Сухой док
Ошибка ядра
ZH 2.0 - no more maintenance after player joins OCV
Zero Hour 1.10
Mordan8 delete
do if $ship.makerRace == [OCV]
return 0
Research milestones effects.
The Dry dock perk lowers maintenance of Caps by 75%, and smaller ships by 25%.
ZH 2.0 - small ships still 25% cheaper
return 0
Zero Hour: ships docked to other ships cost nothing
Mordan8 - Increase maintenance by 35% if the ship is of a design other than what your race normally produces. Specific race maintenance modifiers removed except for Yaki infamy modifier.
Herobetty 4.5: $ship.race will return the ship's current owner. Must check the player's origin race instead.
Add-Ons 1.4: No longer applies to private corp ships (they're neutral and utility-based), Phanon ships after the main plot is completed, or (1.5.2) Yaki ships if the player has infamy.
Change Phanon exemption to foreign exemption.
ZH 2.0 introduced diminishing returns.
Add-Ons 1.4.9: Changed maintenance factors to reflect ship material costs.
By default, the material costs are 100%, 109%, 118%, 127%, 136%, 145%, and 154% from garbage to impeccable. See Mayhem.Costs.Ship.
This means garbage is 79%, mediocre is 86%, flawed is 93%, normal is 100%, good is 107%, exceptional is 114%, and impeccable is 121% of normal.
Old maintenance factors are 58, 82, 94, 100, 106, 110, 111 (why SO LOW for impeccable)? Changed to garbage, mediocre, and impeccable to 66, 83, and 112.
Event: Kernel Bug.
advanced engineering perk where this was built.
"Advanced" ships are more expensive to maintain; as it should be.
Mordan2. - 35% more ship maintenance costs
Add-Ons 1.3: Insane mode increases maintenance by 50%.
